Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Simmer pineapple juice, brown sugar, ketchup, ginger, garlic salt, cornstarch, and soy sauce in a large skillet over low heat for 5 minutes.

Place cooked chicken, bell pepper, onion, and water chestnuts in a 9x13-inch baking dish. Pour the skillet mixture/sauce over the top. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour.
